headline: Ask HN: Tech employees' comp about go down with Meta, Netflix, etc. struggling?
description: The past few years, salary for SWE and Data Scientists was buoyed by the really competitive offers from the likes of Meta, Uber, Netflix, etc.  Now that those companies are facing serious headwind with shrinking profit.  Do you see a re-pricing for SWE/DS salary across the board?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 随着Meta、Netflix等公司的挣扎，技术员工的薪酬将下降？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 隨著Meta、Netflix等公司的掙扎，技術員工的薪酬將下降？
description_zh-Hans: 过去几年，SWE和数据科学家的工资被Meta、Uber、Netflix等公司真正有竞争力的报价所推动。 现在，这些公司正面临着利润缩水的严重逆境。 你认为SWE/DS的工资会全面重新定价吗？
description_zh-Hant: 過去幾年，SWE和數據科學家的工資被Meta、Uber、Netflix等公司真正有競爭力的報價所推動。 現在，這些公司正面臨著利潤縮水的嚴重逆境。 你認為SWE/DS的工資會全面重新定價嗎？
